Dietary intervention reduce daily energy intake , also know caloric restriction ( CR ) , show robust intervention extend average maximal lifespan various experimental animal ( 1 ) . In addition , CR diminish risk multiple age-associated disease , diabetes , cardiovascular disease , form cancer rodent primates ( rhesus monkey ) ( 1 ; 2 ) . Moreover , obese human , CR improve insulin sensitivity reduces fast glucose well component metabolic syndrome ( 3 ) . However , exact underlie mechanism CR fully define yet . Recently , hypothesize liver may regulate systemic energy metabolism production secretory protein know hepatokines . Fetuin-A , circulate glycoprotein almost exclusively secreted liver , find inhibit insulin receptor tyrosine kinase activity animal study ( 4 ) . Fetuin-A knockout ( KO ) mouse enhance glucose sensitivity , resistance weight gain , low serum free fatty acid level ( 5 ) . In human , high fetuin-A level associate insulin resistance fat accumulation liver ( 6 ) . Ix et al . report high human fetuin-A concentration strongly associate metabolic syndrome atherogenic lipid profile non-diabetic patient coronary artery disease ( 7 ) . In addition , fetuin-A level associate surrogate marker atherosclerosis arterial stiffness intima-media thickness ( IMT ) ( 8 ) . Recent study report elevated fetuin-A level predict increase risk myocardial infarction ischemic stroke ( 9 ) well type 2 diabetes ( 10 ) .
